channel.title: Servicenow API Returns - Read json
channel.description:
The below json format i got it from Servicenow API. i need to get "sys_id" value from the below json format in Python script. i have tired via print(content.result["sys_id"]) but no luck. please help.
result: exit_code: 0 result: null stderr: '' stdout: '{''result'': [{''sys_id'': ''563cb250db0c38100a340c65ca9619a0'', ''number'': ''INC10954789''}]}

item.title: Servicenow API Returns - Read json
item.dc:creator: blag
item.description:
What happened when you tried print(content.result[“sys_id”])? What was the output or the error?

item.title: Servicenow API Returns - Read json
item.dc:creator: arul
item.description:
The below json format i got it from Servicenow API. i need to get “sys_id” value from the below json format in Python script.
i have tired via print(content.result[“sys_id”]) but no luck.
please help.

result:
exit_code: 0
result: null
stderr: ‘’
stdout: ‘{’‘result’’: [{’‘sys_id’’: ‘‘563cb250db0c38100a340c65ca9619a0’’, ‘‘number’’: ‘‘INC10954789’’}]}
